name: Pesci's Poem
description:
Explore the bottom half of the Rise N' Grind Nightclub & Coffee Shop as Pesci, a catfish person who's been dragged here for a poetry slam by their close friend after a long night out. Pesci doesn't have any poetry to perform, so they've got to look around the coffee shop for help and inspiration to create a poem for the slam.

Made for the KO!! Slam-Jam on 1/15/2023 with Jacob4Shoe

At this time there is a missing piece of the game right at the end that was unable to be completed by the midnight deadline. You are meant to be able to assemble a poem at the end.

These assets were used in the creation of this game. Thank you to bluecarrot16, MouthlessGames, and Death's Darling for their art/music.

https://opengameart.org/content/snowy-cozyness-calm-pianoguitar 

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-wooden-furniture

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-revised-the-office
